channel.title: Mission on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Mission on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration

item.title: Mission
item.description: The OSLC Community is intended to be an open community collaborating on integration challenges around lifecycle applications, capturing user scenarios for understanding and evolving related specifications for integrating software, and developing integration solutions and prototypes based on those specifications to share with the user community.
